short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autofill forms with data from a backend service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Form Autofill Extension is a powerful tool designed to simplify your online form-filling process. By leveraging data stored in your backend service, this extension automatically detects forms on web pages and populates them with relevant information, saving you time and effort.

Key Features:
Automatic Form Detection: The extension seamlessly detects forms on any webpage.
Data Autofill: Automatically fills out forms with data retrieved from your backend service.
Secure Authentication: Ensures your data remains secure by requiring authentication.
Password Visibility Toggle: Easily toggle the visibility of your password when logging in.
User-Friendly Interface: Modern and intuitive design for a seamless user experience.
How It Works:
Start Detection & Autofill: Click the "Start Detection & Autofill" button to begin.
Automatic Form Population: The extension identifies and populates forms with your stored data.
Secure Login: If unauthorized, enter your email and password to log in securely.
Password Visibility Toggle: Click the eye icon to show or hide your password while typing.
This extension is perfect for anyone who regularly fills out forms online and wants to streamline the process. Whether you're a job seeker, a business professional, or just an everyday user, Form Autofill Extension can save you valuable time and reduce the hassle of manual data entry.
